titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress regarding the 30th anniversary of the enactment of the Clean Water Act.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Water Resources and Environment.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Voice Vote.

committee.name: House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure

bill.summary: 10/30/2001--Introduced. Encourages the American people and all levels of government, as the Nation marks the 30th anniversary of the enactment of the Federal Water Pollution Control Act, to recognize and celebrate the Nation's accomplishments under, and to recommit to achieving the goals of, that Act.
